mapper.select: select id, member_id, title, content, image_name, image_uuid, views, address, type, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by from article where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into article(member_id, title, content, image_name, image_uuid, views, type, address, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageName}, #{imageUUID}, #{views}, #{articleType}, #{address}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedAt}, #{updatedBy});
mapper.update: update article set member_id = #{memberId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_name = #{imageName}, image_uuid = #{imageUUID}, views = #{views}, type = #{articleType}, address = #{address}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, updated_by = #{updatedBy} where id = #{id};
